mcq.statement: Where is Hazuri Bagh Baradari located in relation to Lahore Fort and Badshahi Mosque?

options.c: Between Badshahi Masjid and Lahore Fort

mcq.one_liner: Hazuri Bagh Baradari is situated in the middle of Hazuri Bagh, between **Badshahi Masjid and Lahore Fort**.
